title: Fix admin login authentication failing with invalid credentials error

requirements.text: Debug and fix the admin login authentication endpoint in backend/main.mo to correctly validate username 'admin' and password 'admin123', ensuring successful authentication after Internet Computer deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login accepts username 'admin' with password 'admin123' without showing 'Invalid credentials' error
Successful login redirects to admin dashboard
Authentication token or session is properly generated and returned to frontend
Login works consistently on the deployed Internet Computer canister

requirements.text: Verify the frontend AdminLoginPage.tsx correctly sends login credentials to the backend authentication endpoint and properly handles the authentication response
acceptanceCriteria: Login form sends username and password in the correct format expected by backend
Authentication response is properly parsed and stored
Error handling displays backend error messages accurately

requirements.text: Add console logging to both frontend login submission and backend authentication handler to diagnose the credential validation failure
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend logs show credentials being sent to backend
Backend logs show credentials received and validation result
Logs help identify whether issue is in credential transmission, comparison logic, or response handling

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or other immutable frontend paths
Preserve all existing CodeCrafter branding and UI design
Ensure fix works with Internet Computer deployment constraints
nonGoals: Implementing new authentication methods beyond username/password
Adding password recovery or multi-factor authentication
